name: Cloudy With A Chance Of Sneezing Your Flesh Out
name_original: Cloudy With A Chance Of Sneezing Your Flesh Out
description:
What happens when a cloud gets sick?  They sneeze out vital organs that let them create lightning, create rain, or let sunlight through them, obviously. Then they have to awkwardly pick them all up before they can head on over the doctor's office. What a nightmare!

BONUS TRACK by the wonderful Larntech linked below as well!
